heading: Urban and rural population (%)

name: ECDE net enrolment rate-boys
heading: ECDE net enrolment rate-boys
description: The number of boy children of official ECD age who are enrolled in ECD education as a percentage of the total children of the official ECDE age population.

name: ECDE net enrolment rate-girls
heading: ECDE net enrolment rate-girls
description: The number of boy children of official ECD age who are enrolled in ECD education as a percentage of the total children of the official ECDE age population.
source: Basic Statistics Booklet, Ministry of Education Kenya

heading: Primary average number of students-government schools

description: The average number of children in a public primary school, by county.

name: Primary average number of students-private schools
heading: Primary average number of students-private schools

name: Primary net enrolment rate-boys
heading: Primary net enrolment rate-boys
description: The number of boy children of official primary school age who are enrolled in primary education as a percentage of the total children of the official school age population.

name: Primary net enrolment rate-girls
heading: Primary net enrolment rate-girls
description: The number of girl children of official primary school age who are enrolled in primary education as a percentage of the total children of the official school age population.

name: Primary pupil to teacher ratio-all schools
heading: Primary pupil to teacher ratio-all schools
tooltip: Primary pupil to teacher ratio-all schools
description: The number of pupils per teacher in all primary education schools, by county.

name: Primary pupil to teacher ratio-public schools
heading: Primary pupil to teacher ratio-public schools
tooltip: Primary pupil to teacher ratio-public schools
description: The relationship between the number of pupils enrolled in a public school and the number of 'full-time equivalent' teachers employed by the school, by county.
source: Basic Statistics Booklet, Ministry of Education Kenya

name: Primary pupil to teacher ratio-private schools
heading: Primary pupil to teacher ratio-private schools
tooltip: Primary pupil to teacher ratio-private schools
description: The relationship between the number of pupils enrolled in a private school and the number of 'full-time equivalent' teachers employed by the school, by county.

heading: Secondary average number of students-government schools

name: Secondary average number of students-private schools
heading: Secondary average number of students-private schools

heading: Secondary net enrolment rate-boys

heading: Secondary students-teacher ratio (total)
description: The number of students per teacher in all secondary education schools, by county.

name: Secondary students-teacher ratio (public schools)
heading: Secondary students-teacher ratio (public schools)
description: The relationship between the number of students enrolled in a school and the number of 'full-time equivalent' teachers employed by the school, by county.
source: Basic Statistics Booklet, Ministry of Education Kenya

name: Secondary students-teacher ratio (private schools)
heading: Secondary students-teacher ratio (private schools)
description: The relationship between the number of students enrolled in a school and the number of 'full-time equivalent' teachers employed by the school, by county.
source: Basic Statistics Booklet, Ministry of Education Kenya

name: Proportion of births attended by skilled health personnel (%)
heading: Proportion of births attended by skilled health personnel (%)
tooltip: Birth attendance by skilled health personnel
description: Percentage of births births attended by skilled health personnel, by county.
source: Demographic and Health Survey, 2014, Kenya National Bureau of Statistics

name: Modern contraceptive methods used among married women, any method (15-49 yrs) (%)
heading: Modern contraceptive methods used among married women, any method (15-49 yrs) (%)
description: Use of any modern contraceptive methods among married women of reproductive age (15-49) years, by county.

name: Primary health spending per person
heading: Primary health spending per person
tooltip: County government health spending, per person
description: County government spending to healthcare per person per county.

name: Children under 5 with fever being treated with anti-malarial drugs (%)
heading: Children under 5 with fever being treated with anti-malarial drugs (%)

name: Children 1 year-old immunized against measles (%)
heading: Children 1 year-old immunized against measles (%)
description: Percentage of children 1 year-old immunized against measles, by county.
source: Demographic and Health Survey, 2014, Kenya National Bureau of Statistics

name: Households with insecticide treated net (ITN) mosquito nets (%)
heading: Households with insecticide treated net (ITN) mosquito nets (%)
tooltip: Prevalence of insecticide treated net mosquito nets use
description: Percentage of households with insecticide treated net mosquito nets, by county.
source: Demographic and Health Survey, 2014, Kenya National Bureau of Statistics

name: Children under 5 sleeping under insecticide-treated bed nets (%)
heading: Children under 5 sleeping under insecticide-treated bed nets (%)
tooltip: Use of insecticide-treated bed nets by children under 5
description: Percentage of children under 5 sleeping under insecticide-treated bed nets, by county.

name: Average household size
heading: Average household size
description: The number of people who normally live and eat together, by county.
source: Kenya Population and Housing Census, 2009, Kenya National Bureau of Statistics

name: Population over the age of 64 years, percent of the total (%)
heading: Population over the age of 64 years, percent of the total (%)
tooltip: Population over the age of 64 years, percent of the total (%)
description: This is the ratio of people over the of 64 years to the total population, expressed as a percentage.
source: Kenya Population and Housing Census, 2009, Kenya National Bureau of Statistics

name: Female headed households (%)
heading: Female headed households (%)
description: Percentage of female headed households, by county.
source: Kenya Population and Housing Census, 2009, Kenya National Bureau of Statistics

name: Number of households
heading: Number of households
description: Number of households, by county.
source: Kenya Population and Housing Census, 2009, Kenya National Bureau of Statistics

name: Annual crude birth rate
heading: Annual crude birth rate
tooltip: The number of live births per year per 1,000 midyear population
description: The number of live births occurring among the population of a county during a given year, per 1,000 mid-year total population of the county area during the same year, by county.
source: Kenya Population and Housing Census, 2009, Kenya National Bureau of Statistics

name: Annual crude death rate
heading: Annual crude death rate
tooltip: The number of deaths per year per 1,000 midyear population
description: The number of deaths occurring among the population of a county during a given year, per 1,000 mid-year total population of the county during the same year, by county.
source: Kenya Population and Housing Census, 2009, Kenya National Bureau of Statistics

name: Population density (per sq km)
heading: Population density (per sq km)
description: The population per square kilometre, by county.
source: Kenya Population and Housing Census, 2009, Kenya National Bureau of Statistics

name: Sex ratio
heading: Sex ratio
description: Number of males divided by number of females normalized by multiplying by 100, by county.
source: Kenya Population and Housing Census, 2009, Kenya National Bureau of Statistics

name: Total population
heading: Total population
description: The number of people who live in a county.
source: Kenya Population and Housing Census, 2009, Kenya National Bureau of Statistics

name: Urban population (%)
heading: Urban population (%)
description: Percentage of population living in an urban setting, by county.
source: Kenya Population and Housing Census, 2009, Kenya National Bureau of Statistics

name: Population with a disability (%)
heading: Population with a disability (%)
tooltip: Proportion of persons living with a disability (%)
description: Percentage of people who have a disability, by county.
source: Kenya Population and Housing Census and Kenya Integrated Household Budget Survey 2005/06, Kenya National Bureau of Statistics

name: Human Development Index
heading: Human Development Index
tooltip: Human Development Index for the county
description: A composite statistic of life expectancy, education, and per capita income indicators, used to rank counties on level of human development. A county scores higher HDI when the lifespan is higher, the education level is higher, and the GDP per capita is higher.
source: United Nations Development Programme (UNDP)

name: Poverty gap
heading: Poverty gap
description: The mean shortfall of the total population from the poverty line (counting the non poor as having zero shortfall), expressed as a percentage of the poverty line. This measure reflects the depth of poverty as well as its incidence.
source: Kenya Population and Housing Census and Kenya Integrated Household Budget Survey 2005/06, Kenya National Bureau of Statistics

name: Poverty headcount
heading: Poverty headcount
description: Percentage of people in poverty, in relation to the total population the county, based on the national poverty line. It does not take into account the depth of poverty. The data year is given as the document publication date.
source: Kenya Population and Housing Census and Kenya Integrated Household Budget Survey 2005/06, Kenya National Bureau of Statistics

name: Mean per person monthly expenditure, 2013 prices (KES)
heading: Mean per person monthly expenditure, 2013 prices (KES)
description: The average amount of money (KES) spent by a person in a month in the county.
source: Kenya Population and Housing Census and Kenya Integrated Household Budget Survey 2005/06, Kenya National Bureau of Statistics

name: Most commonly used sanitation facility
heading: Most commonly used sanitation facility
description: The most common sanitation facility used by households in a county.
source: Kenya Population and Housing Census, 2009, Kenya National Bureau of Statistics

name: Households with access to improved sanitation facilities (%)
heading: Households with access to improved sanitation facilities (%)
description: Percentage of the population that has access to improved sanitation facilities, by county.
source: Kenya Population and Housing Census, 2009, Kenya National Bureau of Statistics

name: Most commonly used water source
heading: Most commonly used water source
tooltip: The most common water source used by households in a county
description: The most common water source used by households in a county.
source: Kenya Population and Housing Census, 2009, Kenya National Bureau of Statistics

name: Households with access to safe water (%)
heading: Households with access to safe water (%)
description: Percentage of people with access to safe water, by county.
source: Kenya Population and Housing Census, 2009, Kenya National Bureau of Statistics
